sen.j: 中村 梅之助（なかむら うめのすけ）は、歌舞伎役者。
sen.e: "Umenosuke NAKAMURA" is a name which has been used by several Kabuki (a traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.
sen.cmt: ここでは特定の一人の役者のことを説明しているのではなく、複数の役者に使用されてきた「名前」について言及しているため、そのことが明確になるように訳出いたしました。
sen.e: "Umenosuke NAKAMURA" is a name which has been used by several Kabuki (a traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.
"Umenosuke NAKAMURA" is a name which has been used by several Kabuki (a traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.
The current Umenosuke is the fourth generation.
The current Umenosuke is the fourth generation.

sen.j: - 後の中村翫右衛門 (2代目)。
sen.e: He later became Kanemon NAKAMURA the Second.

sen.j: 2代目中村翫右衛門の子、中村翫右衛門 (3代目)の兄。
sen.e: He was a son of Kanemon NAKAMURA the Second, and was an elder brother of Kanemon NAKAMURA the Third.
